EXECUTE  [dbo].create_schema  @schema

DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [sys].[all_views] t INNER JOIN sys.schemas s ON s.schema_id=t.schema_id WHERE t.[name]=@view AND  s.name=@schema)
BEGIN
    SET @sql= N'DROP VIEW ['+@schema+'].['+@view+']'
    EXEC sp_executesql @tsql = @sql;
END

SET @sql= N'CREATE VIEW ['+@schema+'].['+@view+'] AS ' +  @select_statement
EXEC sp_executesql @tsql = @sql;
